content:
Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe

thought: To craft an iron pickaxe, I need to craft oak planks first. Oak planks can be crafted by placing an oak log in the crafting grid. I have a stripped oak log in slot 45, so I will move it into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
